text: planning? more like perpetual detours at every corner!
retirement didn’t make things clearer; still figuring out tech etiquette...
so much for retirement doing wonders for your budget skills!
saving up's no magic bullet - still gotta dodge curveballs!
psychic readings over solid stocks? wildcard much!
even delivery jobs weren’t free from those molds...trust me!
even retirees notice old workplace biases
life teaches you - those rom-com sparks need kindling into lasting flames through thick & thin; reality's romance trumps fiction every day.
